title: Loose Women - The Podcast
overview: Loose Women - The Podcast will see a different dynamic duo from the award-winning show take to the microphone each episode and offer audiences an extended serving of commentary and conversation around the hottest topics and biggest issues, from news to entertainment and their own lived experiences. As well as taking a deep dive on the topics close to their hearts, viewers will also be able to directly ask the questions that they've always wanted to know about the show and the women themselves.
